name: Mortal Champions
tooltip:
Mortal ChampionsLevel 60

We sense the presence of our enslaved brethren deeper inside Ahn'Qiraj; yet not even an army of dragons would be enough to rescue them, <race>.

The same spell that imprisoned them would place us firmly under C'Thun's control should we come any closer to him.

The Old God has foreseen our arrival.  All hope is lost.  What difference could a mere mortal like you possibly make?

Requirements:
- Qiraji Lord's Insignia
